name: Monika
texts:
I cannot thank you enough
for the effort you pour into
Loanne, day after day.

I want to work hard so that
I can catch up with you, even
if only a little.

I look forward to the day
when we can commemorate
peace rather than war.
reward_text:
I had prepared this item for
the awards ceremony. Please
take it.

name: Final Empress
texts:
Your efforts help support
this world. Thank you.

Be proud. Your very
existence is a wonderful
thing.

I succeeded the Emperor so I
could fight. I'm not good
with formalities.
reward_text:
It isn't quite a good luck
charm, but I hope it brings
you fortune all the same.

name: Mikhail
texts:
Few can match your sense
of determination. It's
fascinating.

I wish you can continue your
efforts.

I find love rather difficult.
It's not easy to be honest
with yourself.
reward_text:
I hope you can find this
useful in the future.

name: Robin
texts:
Don't mind who or what I
might be.

A hero who fights for
justice doesn't reveal his
identity. That's the rule!

I'm the Masked Crusader! You
want the guts to face scum?
Then forget who you were.
reward_text:
My drive for justice is
reinvigorated by your smile.
Here, take this.

name: Wil
texts: Adults don't need gifts.

I just love seeing those
innocent, smiling faces.

I was too hard on my son.
Never gave him any presents.
That was a mistake.
reward_text: Merry Christmas! Ho ho ho!

name: Cordelia
texts:
Why don't you give someone a
present? It'll make both of you
happy for sure.
I want a present, too!

Knowing the fate of the Grave
Knights made me realize a lot
could've happened to me, too.
reward_text:
Thinking about for whom
you're picking out presents is
pure delight.

name: Labelle
texts:
I'm okay. No need to do
anything for me.

I wonder if one day I will wish
to be there for someone else,
too.

If my Anima were to go cold,
I'd end up just like my brother.
reward_text:
Tonight is a time of warmth
and togetherness. Try thinking
about someone else's Anima.

name: Rich
texts:
Once the sun goes down, the
game begins.

I'll be done before anyone is
the wiser.

We don't have this custom in
my world, but I like getting
presents from Dad.
reward_text:
Merry Christmas! I have gifts
for both the cute and beautiful
girls out there!

name: Ginny
texts:
Whoever wants presents, come
closer!
Ginny Santa, coming through!

I gotta say, this is kinda
fun.
reward_text:
Being together with my dad. It
feels like a dream. Alright! I'll
do my best!

name: Flurry
texts: Present time!

The reason I don't melt here
is because I have the
Everfrost Crystal with me.

Come, let us make haste and
go travel the world!
reward_text:
You were good this year, so
here's your gift. Flurry knows
who's been naughty or nice.

name: Flurry Pupil
texts: Zzz... Zzz... Zzz... Zzz...

I get sleepy when I hear
something complicated.
What's Christmas?
reward_text:
I might not be able to wrap my
mind around difficult things,
but here ya go!

name: Flurry Teacher
texts:
The question is... Are you
sleeping while walking? Or
walking while sleeping?

I still don't know what to do to
get them to listen in class and
not fall asleep.

I hear flying snowmen exist,
but I'd like to see with my own
eyes how that is possible.
reward_text:
You must have worked hard to
get to this level. But you
mustn't grow complacent.

name: Gray
texts:
I'm not having it today. Stay
outta my way.

Those people wandering about
nearby are getting on my
nerves.

Everything's an obstacle when
you want to live free.
Including one's own existence.

name: Barbara
texts:
Let your body relax. Dancing's
supposed to be fun.

Come, take my hand. Lead me,
and show me your moves.

Dancing is about more than
twirls. It needs some back and
forth. Much like this world.

name: Myriam
texts:
When you use all-foes magic,
people look at you differently.

The more enemies there are,
the more efficient my all-foes
magic is.

I use all-foes magic even if
there is only one enemy.
Maybe not the best idea.

name: Faerie
texts: Whoa...! So. Many. Humans!

It's been forever since I've left
the village. This calls for a
prank!

There're some big fish down
there. Hope I don't get eaten!
reward_text:
I wonder what'll it be? Hee
hee.

name: Faerie
texts: Thanks for coming.

Celebrating is the best! THE
BEST!

I'll beat you to a pulp if you try
to catch me!
reward_text:
I picked it up earlier. Don't tell
anyone.

name: Faerie
texts: Have fun!

I love pollen in a hot cup of
tea. Want some?
Nope, no butterflies here.
reward_text: Come see me again!

name: Byunei
texts: Offer me some live sacrifices.
I like them young and soft.

Once I am free, I shall devour
your flesh. Nothing will remain
of you.

name: Madeleine
texts:
*sigh* I seem to sigh a lot
these days.

I'm still undecided. I'm still
green.

I can't accept it yet. The trial of
the true Khamsin...

name: Khalid
texts:
This is Khamsin, my scimitar. It
calls to me.

How many Khamsins have I
broken? I can't recall.

Everything comes at a price. It
took me many years to realize
that.

name: Final Emperor
texts: Have the termites resurfaced?
There are termites?!

Someone summoned the
termites? What a fool!

name: Hannibal
texts:
To ensure victory. That is the
duty of the Imperial Guard.

At your command, we shall
claim victory!

A battle lost is nothing if we
win the war.

name: Sophia
texts:
A life filled with flowers. How
wonderful.

I only wish to be like a
beautiful flower and heal the
hearts of others.

Crusaders are dedicated to a
holy purpose. We have no
regrets.

name: Rocbouquet
texts:
Fresh squid is perfectly
translucent. It's truly beautiful.

Yobuko squid? I'll remember
that.

I've been packing on the
pounds lately. Maybe it's time
I found a new body.
reward_text: Here, have a gift. Don't be shy.

name: T260G
texts:
Mud and salt cause
catastrophic failure for mechs.

I'll be there for the next
Gatalympics, too!

The captain's missions are
always tough, but seeing him
smile makes it all worth it.
reward_text: This gift here is first-rate.

name: Taria
texts:
Porcelain is made from
porcelain stone. Anything made
from clay is earthenware.

Porcelain making is big in
this town.

I've relied on magic up to now,
but I realized I can't keep doing
that forever.
reward_text: Here's a gift. Enjoy!

name: Asellus
texts: Enya, enya!
Yoisa, yoisa!

I'm tired and dripping with
sweat... Yet this is the most
fun I've had since that day.
reward_text:
Here's a gift. Can you feel the
exciting festival atmosphere?

name: Citizen of Lance
texts: Don't eat the fruit!

I'll be strong like the
Matriarch when I grow up!
Will I make any new friends?
reward_text:
I also helped decorate it.
Heheh.

name: Citizen of Lance
texts:
The astronomers and I are
patrolling the surrounding
areas.

Vanguard. What a beautiful
place.
The Matriarch will keep us safe.
reward_text:
I pray for the Matriarch's
guidance.

name: Citizen of Vanguard
texts:
I'm keeping an eye on the
offerings so that no one steals
them.

I hear Lance is a beautiful,
snow-covered city.
Hey!
reward_text:
Here's a souvenir from the
festival.

name: Citizen of Vanguard
texts: So many amazing smells!
I'm hungry.
What's Lance like?
reward_text:
Chomp chomp... My hands are
all sticky now.

texts: Hi!

I hear there are strange towers
all across this world.

In this world, it seems that
Slimes like us are pretty rare.

name: Villager
texts: Good day.
Where's the town beauty?

I saw a gooey Slime with red
eyes.

name: Villager
texts: Weather's nice today.

I opened my eye, and I found
myself in a strange place.
Um...

name: Villager
texts: This town is nice and busy.

Is there also an armored king
here?

It's dangerous to leave the
town.

texts: This town is so... colorful!

of colors!

I still dream in black and white.

color soon?

texts: Teleport! ...Huh?

humans and monsters. Do you
understand how we feel?

much.

texts:
Don't get too close to the
screen now. It's bad for your
eyes.

It's important to rest your eyes.
I only have one, so I gotta be
extra careful.

I believe good posture is the
secret to a long life. What do
you think?
reward_text: This is the best I can do.

texts:
I like to think I've done
everything I possibly could.
I'll face this with confidence.

I'm terrified. What if I'm just an
empty person behind the
name of the Bent family?
reward_text:
I only hope I can be of aid to
you.

texts:
Lighter equipment means less
weighing me down.

Yeah, this outfit might be
well-suited for martial arts.

When axe-fighting, let the
weight of the head carry your
strike. It can't be too light.
reward_text: Time to raise hell.

texts:
I cannot return to Loanne just
yet.

I will take back the
Masquerade.

Every time I gather intel, I
remember my foolish past. It
is a heavy burden.

There's never enough time.

Who cares about destiny? I'll
just use my power to protect
the people I should protect.
reward_text: Guess I have to do this.

name: Gwayne
texts: Where will my next battle be?
When will my next battle be?

What happens to this world is
no concern of mine. I wish but
to fight.
reward_text: Is this what humans want?

name: Dorra
texts: Time to eat?
Or is it time to burn?

The world used to be filled
with dragons. But those days
are no more.
reward_text: Fear the dragons!

name: Polka
texts:
I'm ready for whatever
happens.
I'm ready.

If anything happens to me,
please take care of Liz and Jo.
Now I can fight without worry.
reward_text:
I'll keep you safe, no matter
what happens to me.

name: Brownie
texts: Stop talking to me.
Leave me alone.

I don't wanna see them die. I'll
be the first one to go save 'em.
reward_text: I ain't lonely!

name: Madeleine
texts: This is the Khamsin.
This is also the Khamsin.

The coexistence of the
Archfiend and the Matriarch is
absurd, like the two Khamsins.
reward_text:
As the one who holds the true
Khamsin, I shall fulfill my duty.

name: Zenon
texts: Just call me Zenon.
Don't turn to me for help.

People need the Marquisate,
but I cannot be the Marquis of
Loanne. Forgive me.
reward_text:
I'm not the Marquis of Loanne.
I'm just another face in the
crowd.

name: Liz
texts: I'm ready.
I'm sure you'll be fine too, Jo.

Everything will be fine when
I'm with you, Jo. I truly believe
it now.
reward_text:
Let's go. Whatever awaits us,
together we will never lose.

name: Valdor
texts: Let us train together.

Time is running short. We
must train.

Wanting something isn't
enough. We've worked hard.
Now we just have to win.
reward_text:
Have you trained hard
enough?

name: Evelyn
texts:
This is the last time we shall
greet each other.
All will be forgotten with time.

Will I vanish when it's all over?
Or will I continue to exist? It
matters not.
reward_text: The end is near...

name: Shen Du
texts: Something's still missing.

I should have become one
with Master Dahao. Why is it
not working?

Whom I was seeking now
dwells within me. I must live
up to her name.
reward_text:
The wishes entrusted to me
push me forward. I'm sure it's
the same for you, too.

serious. Let's bet on
something. Whatcha got?

a match! If you cut corners, I
will burn you at once.

peering down from great
heights?

Do you want to dream of
flying?

A dream of food? Of stretching
into infinity? All dreams are
great.
reward_text:
What will your story be like
from here on out?

name: Mirsa
texts: I wish everyone happiness.
I wish you happiness.

Knights exist to defend the
smiles on people's faces. We'd
be fine to sacrifice ourselves.
reward_text:
Everyone is smiling. This is
the best, after all.

name: Aldora
texts: Fight me!
Think you can beat me?

It's no fun if you don't get
serious. Let's bet on
something. Whatcha got?
reward_text:
When you're done, we'll have
a match! If you cut corners, I
will burn you at once.

name: Final Empress
texts:
The coming of the new year
makes me solemn.

Don't get too excited. You
must calm your heart.

The year changes, but there
are aspirations we must not
forget.
reward_text:
Let us ring in the new year
with the heart of the emperors
before me.

name: Blue
texts:
A mage must maintain a
strong presence of mind.
I mustn't get too worked up.

Mages of the Magic Realm are
also tasked with taking magic
to the highest level.
reward_text:
This brings me one step closer
to being a true mage.

name: Princess Lion
texts:
Want the lion to bite your head
for luck?
Well, don't cry.

A new year calls for a new
state of mind, but I can't help
but remember the past.
reward_text: This will bring you good luck.

name: Boston
texts:
We are not cannibals, you
know.
I like squid gyoza.

Though I like stuff raw, I have
no problem eating cooked
food.
reward_text: Don't be shy. Take one!

texts:
Are you going to get in my
way?

All those in my way shall be
removed.

You are a fool to summon me.
As a token of gratitude, I shall
take over this world.
reward_text: I shall unleash my full power.

name: Aunus
texts: Burn.
Burn it all.

'Tis a disgrace that my flames
cannot burn the Archfiend. I
shall burn this world instead!
reward_text:
Do you wish to go down in
flames as well?

name: Paulus
texts:
You can sacrifice yourself for
the future.

You can survive and create
the future.

With enough power, there is
no need to bow before the
Sinistrals.
reward_text:
We battle the Sinistrals. Once
again, they shall bear witness
to the strength of our army.

name: Zenon
texts: Here I go!
Let's do this!

I guess I was always so
passionate. I feel I've
reclaimed my true self.
reward_text: Whooa!

name: Byunei
texts: Clear skies are good.
Stormy skies are good, too.

The Archfiend lured me here
with the bait of ruling this sky.
Now I have no desire to return.
reward_text:
From high in the sky, you all
look like ants.

name: Forneus
texts:
I am on dry land only
temporarily.
The sky is but a thin veil.

A true king rules the sea. The
Archfiend sent me for this. The
sea is the world.
reward_text:
You're always welcome in the
depths of my sea.

name: Ferdinand
texts:
Don't let them push us to the
last line of defense!
Just take one step forward.

It's not my style to fight
hunkered down in one spot,
but at times I must.
reward_text: Shall we go for a run together?

texts: A beautiful city... I love it.
A beautiful world... I love it.

I look forward to the day when
I destroy this world.
reward_text:
Are you the sacrifice for my
resurrection feast?

name: Albert
texts: I've found my resolve.
I feel strangely calm.

I stand here on the shoulders
of those who have helped me.
I'm not alone.
reward_text:
Some risked their lives to save
mine. It must be the same for
you, is it not?

name: Neidhart
texts: Follow me!
Eliminate the enemy!

What is there to fear in
demons or Evil Gods? What's
truly frightful are the humans.
reward_text: Don't be afraid. Trust me.

name: Minion (Scorn)
texts:
Fight as many times as it
takes.
Gather your comrades.

Think you've got it? Good.
Everything is going according
to plan.
reward_text: Build up your strength.

It's not betraying the trust of
others.

I have someone I can trust
100%. That is my joy.
reward_text: Just keep looking forward.

texts: I will probably die soon.
You, too, will die in time.

Death is always around me.
It's so close that it's hard to
see.
reward_text:
Death is coming. For me, and
for you.

name: Katarina
texts: I won't let go of you again.
Heed my call!

People's hearts change, but
the Masquerade does not. Not
even if it changes hands.
reward_text:
On my pride, I will gather my
strength for him this time.

name: Leonid
texts: I require blood.

Is your blood fit to be a
testament?

Trust is something to be
betrayed. But I cannot betray
the pact I made with that girl.
reward_text: Offer me blood.

Have you seen Jo or Bert
around?

Every time I try to give them a
hug, they run off.

Believing in Jo and Bert's
future gives me strength.
reward_text:
Believing in Jo and Bert's
future gives me strength.

name: Polka
texts: Our family grew again.
I'm full of joy.

I don't care if the world ends if
it means I can protect Jo and
Bert.
reward_text:
I don't care if the world ends if
it means I can protect Jo and
Bert.

texts:
Liz... What a wonderful name.
And you grew up just as
wonderfully.

Polka... Why did we give you
such a fun name?

I don't know what I am
anymore. All I know is I want
to protect my family.
reward_text:

texts:
Stop trying to peek through my
armor!

Are you imagining what it's like
underneath? Vulgar!

The days of concealing this
body of mud in armor are over.
I am free at last.
reward_text:
The days of concealing this
body of mud in armor are over.
I am free at last.

name: Wicked Witch
texts: The Archfiend shall pay.

I shall cause him agony,
torment, and by my hand he
shall die!

Can the Archfiend be killed? I
seek only revenge. I've no use
for rational thought.
reward_text: The Archfiend shall pay.

name: Witch's Daughter
texts: I stand out looking like this.

It feels like everyone is staring
at me.

Why am I so driven to seek
the truth? Even I do not know
why.
reward_text:
Why am I so driven to seek
the truth? Even I do not know
why.

name: Zenon
texts: The future is in my hands.
I cannot forsake the past.

The future is unknowable and
regretting the past is futile.
Live in the present.
reward_text: The future is in my hands.

texts: You're welcome to pay me.
Till the end, let me do as I will.

All in all, fighting's what I love.
And I get to go all out this
time, so it should be fun.
reward_text:
All in all, fighting's what I love.
And I get to go all out this
time, so it should be fun.

name: Gerard
texts: I am ready.
Please assign me any task.

I fight for this world. I wish to
complete my mission. I seek
not praise nor honor.
reward_text: Please assign me any task.

name: Mariah
texts:
The world is more than just
land.

Of course, stormy seas can be
scary.

We can make an army out of
warriors of the sea. With me! I
shall lead us.
reward_text:
We can make an army out of
warriors of the sea. With me! I
shall lead us.

name: Rouge
texts: The world is worth protecting.

There is no meaning in
destruction alone.

I had my doubts about
restoring the Magic Realm.
But now, I have faith.
reward_text: The world is worth protecting.

name: Monika
texts:
I understand your
anxiousness.
It's hard to keep smiling.

The reason I'm here, 300
years later, is to share the
power of hope with everyone.
reward_text:

texts:
I don't want to talk about
anything right now.
There is nothing to talk about.

Destiny is like placing a piece
in a puzzle. A piece that is
only mine to place.
reward_text:
Destiny is like placing a piece

only mine to place.

texts:
Something feels off about
being alive.
I never thought I'd be here.

I'm just an empty shell now. I
have no answers. From here
on, I'm going to look for them.
reward_text:
I'm just an empty shell now. I
have no answers. From here
on, I'm going to look for them.

texts: Do not fear the future.

I died more than 200 years
ago. That is the truth. This era
belongs to you.

I died more than 200 years
ago. That is the truth. This era

texts:
When light spills forth, it casts
a shadow.
It's not bad to have shadows.

After 300 years, I made a
friend called Bertrand. Coming
to this world was worth it.

Our true enemy is out there
somewhere.
We must fight our true enemy.

Fighting only the enemy in
front of you in order to live...
You can't keep that up forever.

name: Faerie
texts: Have fun!

I love nectar in a nice, hot cup
of tea. Want some?
Nope, no butterflies here.
reward_text:
Happy Half Anniversary!
Here's a special gift from us!

name: Faerie
texts: Whoa...! So. Many. Humans!

It's been forever since I've left
the village. This calls for a
prank!

There're some big fish down
there. Hope I don't get eaten!
reward_text:
Happy Half Anniversary!
Here's a special gift from us!

name: Faerie
texts: Thanks for coming.

Celebrating is the best!
THE BEST!

I'll beat you to a pulp if you try
to catch me!

Here's a special gift from us!

reward_text: I was told only a genius like my brother could dual-wield.

name: Mondo
texts: Do not fight a battle you cannot win. This is the secret to not losing.
The best one can do is to settle things without fighting at all.
Lord it over a weak enemy if you will, but if you see a mighty foe, turn and run.
reward_text: The best one can do is to settle things without fighting at all.

name: Elysed
texts: Relax. You cannot be one with the Spirituals with a troubled heart.
Focus. The Spirituals will take everything from you if your heart is disturbed.
Spirituals give power to spells. Open your mind and body without fear or shame.
reward_text: Relax. You cannot be one with the Spirituals with a troubled heart.

name: Tsubaki
texts: A witch stole the heart of someone very dear to me.
Some lose their hearts to witches while trying to get their loved ones back.
Witches only take. They take as they desire. Do not say it is the victim's fault!
reward_text: A witch stole the heart of someone very dear to me.

name: Kumi
texts: I love treasure. I have no time for anyone who doesn't smell of it.
Treasure. Good-looking men. Surrounded by my favorite things. This is the life.
I feel better next to a hot guy. What's wrong with choosing a man based on his looks?
reward_text: I love treasure. I have no time for anyone who doesn't smell of it.

name: Chiago Lisboa
texts: I want to hear you scream!
More! Louder!
Screams of fear comfort me more than sweet words. All the more from those I love.
reward_text: I want to hear you scream!

name: Jo
texts: Was Rocbouquet pulling my leg?
I want squid!
Good things don't come easy, so this one's definitely gonna be tasty!
reward_text: I want squid!

name: Polka Lynn Wood
texts: With my blade, I cut!
With flames, I burn!
I had to cook in the circus, and the ringmaster was a gourmet. Trust my skills!
reward_text: With flames, I burn!

name: Liz Lynn Wood
texts: We're running out of time. Let's go!
I'll reward whoever's first!
None will die storming this castle. Everyone's giving it their all. It's nice.
reward_text: We're running out of time. Let's go!

name: Rocbouquet
texts: I must have learned it somewhere.
The Emperor was supposed to be my enemy.
I don't even remember whose power is now within me. And that's that.
reward_text: I don't even remember whose power is now within me. And that's that.

name: Macha
texts: I love rides!
All aboard! Come on, everybody!
The stars are limitless. We can go anywhere and beyond. So, where to?
reward_text: I love rides!

name: Matriarch
texts: Chasing illusions isn't so bad every now and again.
Nighttime is when the illusions show themselves.
Of course, denying reality is no way forward, but chasing illusions isn't a sin.
reward_text: Nighttime is when the illusions show themselves.

I want squid!
Good things don't come easy, so this one's definitely gonna be tasty!

name: Orlouge
texts: Perhaps I'll transform into a fox, too.
I shall make the inner shrine my throne.
Did you think mystics liked gloomy hues? This vermillion makes my soul sing.
reward_text: I shall make the inner shrine my throne.

name: Goddess
texts: They are perhaps more formidable than Arsenal.
They look more appetizing than Arsenal.
The systems that protect us can turn against us. They must be constantly checked.
reward_text: They are perhaps more formidable than Arsenal.

name: Monika
texts: Please unwind in this hot bath.
Have some scrumptious food and refresh yourself.
Take your responsibilities and put them away, just for tonight.
reward_text: Please unwind in this hot bath.

name: Noel
texts: Time, I have in spades. All I've left is to train.
Honing your mind is much more difficult than honing your body.
If I'm to master the power I've gained through assimilation, I've no choice but to train.
reward_text: Honing your mind is much more difficult than honing your body.

name: Katarina
texts: Lying is not allowed. No lies!
Your arms will burn if you lie before a god.
Even rats have their say. Who can claim that man is always right?
reward_text: Lying is not allowed. No lies!

name: Gustave
texts: I like to work with my hands.
It's something I can do even if I can't use spells.
I'm not good at tiny, repetitive movements. My own clumsiness irritates me.
reward_text: I like to work with my hands.

name: Galahad
texts: I've won!
Where'd I get it? That's a secret.
I can live on as long as I have this Ice Sword.
reward_text: I can live on as long as I have this Ice Sword.

name: Galahad
texts: I've won!
Where'd I get it? That's a secret.
I can live on as long as I have this Ice Sword.
reward_text: I can live on as long as I have this Ice Sword.

name: Forneus
texts: Hear me, you who have adapted to life in water and on land!
We shall attack and defend with the ebb and flow.
We shall attack the land from this shoal. It is time to rewrite the order of the Sinistrals.
reward_text: We shall attack and defend with the ebb and flow.

name: Alloces
texts: Just keep charging forward!
Look nowhere but straight ahead!
Charge recklessly for victory. Is that not the greatest way to win?
reward_text: Just keep charging forward!

name: Aunus
texts: Do not move sideways. Move forward!
You have weapons and armor on you. Trust your might.
'Tis subversion. The prey shall consume. My flames shall create a new order.
reward_text: Do not move sideways. Move forward!
